Weekly Client Message

Gmail Unsubscribe and Promotions Folder

Frank Klesitz,
CEO Vyral Marketing

Clients,

If you use Gmail I’m sure you’ve noticed an “Unsubscribe” link at the top of many emails now. You also see a new “Promotions” folder where many of your promotional messages now go.

I love it. I spend a majority of my day in email as I’m sure you do, too.

Anything to decrease interruptions to my day the better. I get a mountain of email from vendors, salespeople, and businesses who don’t respect my inbox. I say, “Unsubscribe them!”

But how do these Gmail changes effect the email you’re sending with us?
Read this week's client message

Video of the Week

Is Selling this Fall a good idea?

Austin's real estate market is one of the most competitive in the country. Right now, seller's have the upper hand, as buyers are often finding themselves in multiple offer situations. These are stressful times to be a buyer, especially if you're not armed with the requisite knowledge to get your offer accepted. Luckily, we're here to help.


Vyral Client Shawn Culhane in Cedar Park, TX scored 20 out of 22 points on the perfect video checklist.

Email Topic of the Week

What You Need to know about Indian Leased Land in the Palm Springs Area

"If you're considering selling your home, there are a handful of things you need to do before you list. For one, you'll want to have a professional roofer inspect your roof. Many homeowners don't even think about it, but the roof problems can be awfully expensive and if there are problems with it, potential buyers might shy away."


We’d like to congratulate Vyral Client Ron Wagener in Sun Lakes, AZ for having the best performing topic this week, achieving a 28% open rate and a 12% click rate.
